title: Kate Winslet and Idris Elba take a break from filming | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 135 shares The Finding Neverland star donned a black T-shirt and a classic blazer with a blue and white stripy scarf bundled around her neck. The actress was clearly in work mode, carrying a laptop case and wearing a pair of black-rimmed spectacles. Heartthrob: Idris grinned as he made his way inside to meet Kate and discuss filming Idris, 44, grinned as he arrived to meet his co-star. The Jungle Book actor wore a black long-sleeved top under a T-shirt and a baseball cap. The Mountain Between Us is based on a Charles Martin's bestselling novel about a surgeon and a writer who fall in love after a plane crash. The two characters find themselves stranded on a mountain and must learn how to survive in the hostile environment while suffering broken ribs and a leg fracture. Before Kate and Idris came on board, the film had a troubled casting history. Michael Fassbender, Margot Robbie and Rosamund Pike were all at one point attached to the project but dropped out citing scheduling conflicts. The film, which is expected to be an Oscar contender, is due to be released in October. On set: Kate and Idris looked preoccupied on set.
